input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: BKW ENERGIE AG - PROCUREMENT SERVICES. Summary: New it Solution for Customer-Centric Billing and Service Processes Energy & Networks. Description: This public tender will procure an integrated software solution for the energy industry. This will include contract management and measurement-based billing of energy and network services as well as the digitalization and automation of customer processes (Customer Relationship Management).<br> Lot 1 covers the areas of commercial contract management, customer service, network connection management, marketing as well as the comprehensive control and orchestration of customer and partner-related processes.<br> Contract management and billing for measurement based Tariffs<br> Lot 2 covers the areas of operational contract management as well as the billing of measured value-based energy and network services for consumers and producers.<br> Doc Title: New IT solution for customer-centric billing and service processes Energy & Networks<br> Contract type: services. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2026-01-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: New it Solution for Customer-Centric Billing and Service Processes Energy & Networks

Summary: it Software, Replacement of Webshop Lb, Implementation and Operation over 5 Years, Optional 2-Year Extension and Additional Webshop. This call for proposals will evaluate a suitable partner for the development, maintenance and operation of this information channel.<br> Main CPV: 72200000 Software Programming and -advice

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SUBMISSIONS UNIT - DEPARTMENT OF PLANNING, CONSTRUCTION AND MOBILITY (DACM) OF THE CITY OF GENEVA. Summary: Implementation of an Iot Infrastructure for Building Management (M348ti) Electrical Installations Mandate. Description: Electrical installation services<br> Estimate: CHF 579,000.-<br> The Energy Department of the City of Geneva (hereinafter abbreviated by ENE) acts to maintain and optimize technical installations and reduce the energy consumption of the built heritage of the City of Geneva. In the as part of a loan granted by the City of Geneva for the development of loT projects, ENE wants to set up an loT network based mainly on LoRa technology and covering the entire value chain, i.e. sensors, the LoRa network, data processing and visualization collected. ENE already manages some 400 installed sensors today and plans to deploy more than 1,500 as part of this project. A service provider is being sought to set up and manage this future LoT network as well as to promote and present the data collected.<br> The project covers the establishment of a LoT network using LoRa technology for the recording and processing of data generated by sensors deployed in buildings in the territory of the City of Geneva. The project includes the following elements:<br> * Provision of a LoRa service based on an existing network with geographical coverage covering the territory of the City of Geneva and neighboring municipalities;<br> * The supply and installation of sensors ensuring the recording and sending of data (temperatures, humidity, energy, water, gas, alarms, etc.);<br> * Implementation of interfaces Nec.... Published Date: 2025-10-31. Closing Date: 2025-12-10. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The Social Insurance Office of the Canton of Bern (ASV) is replacing the existing specialist application EVOK with a new case management system. The subject of the tender is the development, introduction and operation of a solution including maintenance, support and further development.<br> The system should Targeted relief for ASV employees in the core processes of premium reduction and compulsory health insurance and ensuring consistent, efficient and secure data management. It must have standardized interfaces to cantonal and national surrounding systems and meet all legal, organizational and safety requirements of the Canton of Bern. instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: WINTERTHUR CANTONAL HOSPITAL - SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT. Summary: Licensing Microsoft. Description: The aim of this tender is to ensure Microsoft licensing in accordance with the licensing strategy redefined in 2025. We are looking for a licensing partner who can reliably, economically and reliably provide the Winterthur Cantonal Hospital with the necessary licenses for the years 2026 to 2028 in the desired configuration. With this tender, the KSW is identifying a licensing partner for the years 2026-2028 (lot 1) and a license supplier for individual licenses for the year 2025 (lot 2)<br> Licensing 2026-2028<br> This lot includes the licenses from the KSW's existing contracts with Microsoft:  Select+  Enterprise Agreement (EA)  Cloud Solution Provider (CSP)  Server and Cloud Enrollment (SCE)<br> Purchasing individual licenses<br> In order to address the increasing cost pressure in the healthcare system and to keep IT spending as low as possible in the coming years certain Microsoft Office licenses should be procured as verified used licenses. This lot includes the delivery of licenses that are fully compliant and operational from a legal and technical perspective.<br> Doc Title: Licensing Microsoft<br> Contract type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-10-30. Closing Date: 2025-11-24. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: WINTERTHUR CANTONAL HOSPITAL - SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT
output.Summary: Licensing Microsoft

We are looking for a licensing partner who can reliably, economically and reliably provide the Winterthur Cantonal Hospital with the necessary licenses for the years 2026 to 2028 in the desired configuration. With this tender, the KSW is identifying a licensing partner for the years 2026-2028 (lot 1) and a license supplier for individual licenses for the year 2025 (lot 2)<br> Licensing 2026-2028<br> This lot includes the licenses from the KSW's existing contracts with Microsoft:  Select+  Enterprise Agreement (EA)  Cloud Solution Provider (CSP)  Server and Cloud Enrollment (SCE)<br> Purchasing individual licenses<br> In order to address the increasing cost pressure in the healthcare system and to keep IT spending as low as possible in the coming years certain Microsoft Office licenses should be procured as verified used licenses. This lot includes the delivery of licenses that are fully compliant and operational from a legal and technical perspective.<br> Doc Title: Licensing Microsoft<br> Contract type: supplies

Up to this point, the retirement center was completely part of the city's administration and management Support structures embedded, especially in the city's IT infrastructure and services. With the spin-off, responsibility for operation, security and further development of IT is transferred to the new organization. For further operation An independent IT environment that is completely separate from the city is therefore required. Main CPV: 72000000 IT services: consulting, software development, Internet and assistance. Published Date: 2025-10-24. Closing Date: 2025-12-03. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR BUILDINGS AND LOGISTICS BBL. Summary: (25171) 605 Sap Consulting 2026-2030. Description: With this tender, framework contracts for contracts in the area of SAP consulting are to be awarded to a maximum of 3 external IT service providers who provide the FTA with the development, advice and maintenance and support of SAP modules, their interfaces as well as in IT projects, IT changes or for IT operations including the underlying SAP system architecture. The calls are made in the form of service orders (no staff leasing).<br> The focus is on advice on the conception, implementation and introduction of module-specific SAP solutions. In addition, must the handover to the company must be ensured.<br> The orders concern new projects, ongoing IT operations as well as operationally relevant projects and sub-projects that arise from IT operations through the factory and BizDevOps approach and again in the project introduction phases flow back into IT operations.<br> The tender is aimed at providers who have employees who cover all required SAP roles for service provision in order to cover the entire SAP modules, SAP technologies or SAP products used.<br> (25171) 605 SAP Consulting 2026-2030<br> With this tender, framework contracts for contracts in the area of SAP consulting are to be awarded to a maximum of 3 external IT service providers who provide the FTA with the development, advice and maintenance and support of SAP modules, their interfaces as well as in IT Project.... input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: CITY OF WIL, TECHNICAL OPERATIONS, TBW. Summary: District Heating Wil, Tender for Transfer Stations, Control System and Leak Monitoring. Description: The Technical Operations Wil (TBW) is planning a district heating network. This is supplied with waste heat from the waste incineration plant of the Bazenheid Waste Recycling Association (ZAB). The heat is transported to the south of the city of Wil via a 5.2 km long transfer line. From there it is distributed over two main lines: one leads to the west of the city to the St.Gallen Psychiatry, the other to the east via the Lindenhof school complex to Wil Hospital. The first heat delivery in Wil is planned for the 2026/2027 heating season.<br> Main CPV: 48000000 software package and information systems. Published Date: 2025-10-11. Closing Date: 2025-11-25. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR BUILDINGS AND LOGISTICS BBL. Summary: (25057) 810 Gin 2025+ Maintenance, Support and further Development. Description: The GIN application was developed by SLF as an open source software on behalf of the Lainat and has been in operation since 2010. The Source Code of Gin is completely owned by the Federal Administration and may be adapted and further developed. The specialist application collects and visualizes current measurement and observation data from:<br> * Federal Office for the Environment Bafu<br> * Federal Office of Meteorology and Climatology Meteoschweiz<br> * WSL institute for snow and avalanche research SLF<br> * Swiss earth development SED<br> The information includes around 90 measuring sizes (e.g. wind strengths, water levels, snow depths, etc.) Of over 600 weather, 300 water and 150 snow measuring stations. The data is sometimes updated every 3 minutes. Measuring data from cantons and stations of private providers are also integrated on gin.<br> The GIN application is designed for natural hazards experts and is currently only available. The platform is used intensively by the users, especially when natural and extreme events (e.g. storms, floods or avalanches). Around 3,500 users are currently registered with gin. The tendency is rising. Because of the complex content and the many Functionalities and the lower resolution can only be used to a limited extent on mobile devices (smartphones). The use of gin on mobile devices, especially in the event of an event, is becoming increasingly important and is desired by a large part of the users.<br> The Gin application becomes hoc.... Published Date: 2025-08-21. Closing Date: 2025-10-10. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The data is sometimes updated every 3 minutes. Measuring data from cantons and stations of private providers are also integrated on gin.<br> The GIN application is designed for natural hazards experts and is currently only available. The platform is used intensively by the users, especially when natural and extreme events (e.g. storms, floods or avalanches). Around 3,500 users are currently registered with gin. The tendency is rising. Because of the complex content and the many Functionalities and the lower resolution can only be used to a limited extent on mobile devices (smartphones). The use of gin on mobile devices, especially in the event of an event, is becoming increasingly important and is desired by a large part of the users.<br> The Gin application becomes hoc...

At the time of the conclusion of the contract, the LUKS decides whether the devices by Buy, can be obtained by rental/purchase or rent.<br> With your offer, the provider submits extensive solution concepts for the structure, operation and safety for the printers and MFP at all main and subordinates of the LUK, with roll-out until June 30, 2026.<br> That with the service provider SLA to be locked up includes all activities from acceptance, labeling and inventory to the right delivery and commissioning of the devices procured via the framework contract, the on-site support, repair services, the proactive maintenance, the Special maintenance of the important devices and the SPOC. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR BUILDINGS AND LOGISTICS BBL. Summary: (25176) 317 Nux Statistics Portal - New Website Statistics.Admin.Ch. Description: The subject of procurement is the creation and provision of a user-centered website based on the content management system (CMS) Drupal and a cloud infrastructure on Amazon Web Services. The website includes a responsive design according to the CD-Bund, a user-friendly Content management, predefined side stipulation as well as necessary functional extensions for drupal extensions. In addition, there is a powerful search function that enables structured content search, as well as the interface connection to existing data sources (DAM/WSP) And the automated data transfer or migration of the content of the old system. The technical facility, configuration and training as well as documentation for maintaining the content by future users (editors) are also included.<br> Main CPV: 72000000 IT services: advice, Software development, internet and assistance. Published Date: 2025-07-08. Closing Date: 2025-08-18. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: HOCH HEALTH OSTSCHWEIZ, DEPARTMENT IT. Summary: Printingnext. Description: The service printing is part of the service portfolio of DIT. This mainly includes office printers (Ricoh) with several device categories and types. In addition to the office printer, the central printer baking infrastructure manages and controls other various special printer.<br> The office printer as well The printer baking infrastructure is operated and supervised by a partner (Ricoh).<br> The partner also obtains and maintains (without toner procurement/exchange) also the special printers of Zebra and Brother, as well as preventive maintenance for Kodak high-performance scanner.<br> The existing partner has 2 employees on site for the end device support and the toner exchange for the office printers on the St.Gallen campus. The end device support takes place at the outdoor locations after the order is granted. The partner organizes a technician. Toner/cartridges of the office printers are on the Exchange outdoor locations by the users on site. The toner/cartridges for office printers are sent to the location in the event of a defined threshold by the partner. If the remaining tone containers cannot be changed by the user, this must be done by the partner.<br> The Printer baking infrastructure consists of print servers (printer cone, driver), application/application servers (Genius bytes Pullprint, workflows) and management server of the current printing partner. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: LAUSANNE INDUSTRIAL SERVICES - SHARED SERVICES - IT DIVISION. Summary: Sil - Sap Application Maintenance. Description: The Lausanne industrial services, hereinafter referred to as the contractor, appeal to submission for third-party application maintenance (TMA) covering several SAP functional systems and modules. To date, the contractor has a SAP environment on site (on-premise) Hosted by the Organization and Computer Science Service (SOI) of the City of Lausanne. This environment includes both technical components such as SAP Basis and functional modules, including SAP CRM or FI / CO. Tenderers will have to show proven expertise on SAP, including the mastery of recent features and innovations in the field. They will also have to offer a relevant operational model, aligned with the maintenance requirements of the adjudicator. Finally, tenderers are expected as proactive suppliers, forces of Proposal and capable of registering their approach in a logic of continuous improvement.<br> Main CPV: 72,500,000 IT services. Published Date: 2025-06-23. Closing Date: 2025-09-05. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SCHWEIZERISCHE BUNDESBAHNEN SBB, INFORMATIK EINKAUF. Summary: Osdm-Distributor. Description: The aim of the tender is to procure the OSDM Distributor technical system component in the form of Software as a Service. For more information on OSDM, see https://osdm.io . The OSDM model is divided into different roles that participants can assume: Fare provider role: sets the tariffs and the rules for combining them and makes them available to distributors offline or online. Distributor role: combines fares, defines after-sales rules within the framework set by the fare providers, provides combined offers and manages the booking transaction, takes care of ticket security (barcode, control processes), manages compensation processes. Retailer role: sells tickets to customers from one or more distributors, selects the distributors and merges multiple independent bookings. The tender focuses on the role of the OSDM Distributor in an international context. The complete item to be procured can be found in the tender documents. <br> Doc Title: OSDM-Distributor <br> Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-06-10. Closing Date: 2025-07-01. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Osdm-Distributor

instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SWISSGRID AG. Summary: Software Development Services for Outage Planning Platform. Description: With this tender, called Software Development Services for Outage Planning Platform, Swissgrid intends to conclude framework agreements with two (2) suitable partners over a period of 14.25 years starting October 1, 2025, who will provide the following services in the area of software development: * consulting, analysis and conceptualisation * design and implementation * enhancements, improvements, and maintenance * testing * documentation * support It is expected that the service providers sought will be able to support Swissgrid both throughout the entire life cycle and for individual phases. The main application to be developed is called ORCA App. ORCA App also encompasses its parts of the integration with other applications. The supplier contracted will be the IT-technical software development responsible for the ORCA App. The ORCA Project, Swissgrid-side, additionally covers the data interfaces and functional developments in other existing and newly developed IT systems in Swissgrid either by driving those developments or coordinating with developments driven by other Swissgrid projects. The goal is to evolve this set of IT systems to form an integrated ORCA Platform providing a harmonized User Experience (UX) for the business processes of all user groups by 2030. In addition, maintenance, support and further development are planned until 2039. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: OFFICE FOR POPULATION PROTECTION, SPORTS AND MILITARY OF THE CANTON OF BERN (BSM). Summary: Protection Structures Application 2026+. Description: The procurement of the procurement "protective buildings application 2026+" is a change in the law of the cantonal population protection law, which comes into force in 2026. With this amendment to the law, responsibility for the management of the approximately 50,000 shelters from the 335 municipalities passes to the canton.At the same time, the Office for Population Protection, Sport and Military of the Canton of Bern is commissioned to build up an overall cantonal database via the shelter and the protective facilities and to provide municipal bodies, commissioned third parties and civil protection organizations to access this.The aim of the present procurement is to evaluate and procure a specialist application suitable for supporting the tasks mentioned. <br> Main CPV: 48100000 industry -specificSoftware package. Description: The LUKS is looking for providers who want to conclude a framework contract for the procurement of Endpoint Devices with the LUKS and a SLA for the existing and for the components procured by the framework contract. <br> The core of the framework contract is a living product portfolio thatRequirements of the LUK and which during the term of the framework contract is continuously supplemented and renewed by the service provider in consultation with the LUKS (therefore "alive"). Based on the framework contract, the service provider continuously delivers devices to the LUKS and thus providesthe stock of the devices required there. <br> With the present tender, the provider submits an offer based on the framework contract for the delivery of a virtual but realistic shopping cart on Endpoint Devices and the associated SLA. <br> That with the service providerSLA to be locked up includes all activities from procurement to the right delivery of the devices procured via the framework contract, the repair services for the existing and available devices and their life cycling, the SPOC, the regular service checkas well as advice as required, e.g. when performing POCs. <br> In the knowledge that the joint development of such a comprehensive and effective and efficient procurement process with and the definition of services tailored to the LUKS by the service providerZ.... instruction: Extract and classify the tender information into structured fields such as TOT ID, Tender Notice No, Tender Value, Currency, CPV, Sector, Sub-Sector, and More Details link from the following tender text.
input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SWISSGRID AG. Summary: Support of the Team Capacity Calculation & Congestion Management. Description: CACM[1] , SOGL[2] and CEP[3] directives of the EU (European Union) are designed with the goal to prepare European electricity transmission grids and energy markets for high penetration of renewable energy sources in the future. One of the biggest challenges for European TSOs is to ensure grid security under conditions with increased cross-zonal capacities. Grid security is expected to be ensured through redispatch coordinated on European level. This shall be established through SOGL Art. 76 - Regional Operational Security Coordination (ROSC). The international ROSC processes follow a complex methodology, interlinked with numerous other methodologies which originate from CACM, SOGL and CEP directives. The subject of this tender is solely the support local implementation of ROSC at Swissgrid. Swissgrid runs a project to adapt its existing processes and fit them to the requirements of the ROSC Methodology. This includes the development of new software that shall be operated at Swissgrid. The vendors for the new software were selected in summer 2023, and the development has started in autumn 2023. [1] Regulation (EU) 2015/1222 establishing a guideline on capacity allocation and congestion management [2] Regulation (EU) 2017/1485 establishing a guideline on electricity transmission system operation [3] REGULATION (EU) 2019/943 on the internal market for electricity, Clean Energy Package <br> Doc Title: Support of the Team Capacity Calculation & Congestion Management <br> .... Published Date: 2025-04-03. Closing Date: 2025-05-13. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Support of the Team Capacity Calculation & Congestion Management

The subject of this tender is solely the support local implementation of ROSC at Swissgrid. The vendors for the new software were selected in summer 2023, and the development has started in autumn 2023. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: BASLER VERKEHRSBETRIEBE (BVB). Summary: Replacement Procurement Ticket Machines. Description: The Basel Verkehrsbetriebe (BVB), together with other transport companies, operate stationary ticket machines in the Swiss cantons of Basel-Stadt, Basel-Landschaft, Solothurn, Aargau and the border foreign countries. The devices have reached their mechanical and technical end of life and shouldbe replaced by a new device generation in 2027. <br> Currently there are devices of the "AFA 490" type of ATRON Systems AG. The individual devices are owned by various transport companies. All devices in use are the sameBackend connected, which is operated in a company community of the various transport organizations together with Atron. In the future, a comparable constellation and a comparable acquisition and operation are planned. This means that the submissionThe procurement devices, all of which will be of the same type or model, are bought by different organizations from the survey recipient on their own account and will remain in the possession of the respective buyer; All devices purchased via the submission are the sameBackend connected and operated between several transport companies via a company community. The Basel Verkehrsbetriebe carry out the submission process for all organizations below. The following companies and authorities are availableSub.... Published Date: 2025-03-20.
